us.pserver.revok.container

Class Credentials

  • java.lang.Object
    • us.pserver.revok.container.Credentials

  • public class Credentials
extends java.lang.Object
    The Credentials object encapsulates information about username, password and namespace access for authentication with the server.
    Version:
    1.1 - 201506
    Author:
    Juno Roesler - juno@pserver.com

      • authenticate

        public boolean authenticate(Credentials c)
        Authenticate this Credentials against other Credentials instance. The equals method could be used instead.
        Parameters:
        c - Another credentials object.
        Returns:
        true if the user name and password of the another instance, is exactly the same of this instance of Credentials.
